meaningMnemonic: Aim the <radical>scooter</radical>'s <radical>neck</radical> at the <kanji>road</kanji>! Scooters are only meant for driving on <kanji>street</kanji>s and <kanji>path</kanji>s, and if you go the wrong <kanji>way</kanji>, you'll probably break your own neck!
readingMnemonic:
To remember the reading どう we use the word "doughnut."

You're traveling down this <kanji>road</kanji> so fast that you don't see the giant <reading>dou</reading>ghnut (どう) that's rolling toward you until the last minute. You crash into it, and both you and the doughnut go tumbling down. Ahg, your neck!
